name: Ninety Nines Flying School
about: Ninety-Nines Flying School, established in 1975 at Wilson Airport, is a renowned flying training organization serving the private, commercial, and airline sectors in East Africa. With over four decades of experience, we have trained pilots from diverse cultural backgrounds worldwide. Our training programs are accredited by the Kenya Civil Aviation Authority, ensuring high industry standards. We offer a well-structured ground school curriculum and flight training with a fleet of 13 modern aircraft, maintaining a low student-aircraft ratio for efficient training. Our experienced instructors, with over 40,000 flight hours, provide quality instruction and mentorship. We prioritize safety and professionalism, offering flexible payment options to accommodate all students. Whether your goal is recreational or professional flying, we customize programs to meet your needs, ensuring you become a highly qualified pilot with the skills necessary for a successful aviation career.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport License
Multi-Engine Instrument Rating
Qualified Flying Instructors"]
